label: 傅
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Principal member of the Crown Prince's Office.  The Mentor, whose task was to serve as a moral guide, leading the Prince in virtuous paths," was ordinarily a Minister of State or Major Counselor, and thus outranked the Master of the Crown Prince's Household (p. 823). [春宮坊、大臣、大納言、大夫] "
